name: The Witcher: The New Path
description:
an up and coming UNOFFICIAL Witcher visual novel FAN game. Based on The Witcher books by Andrzej Sapkowski and The Witcher games by CDPR.

CURRENTLY INCLUDES: 

30+ minutes of play time, 2 quests for the first out of 4 upcoming origins; the commoner. 

UPCOMING UPDATE WILL FEATURE:

  • Non-fullscreen play option
  • Change resolution window option
  • Stats and/or sympathy level systems
  • Expanded music library
  • Non-binary dialogue options and pronouns
  • Expansion on the Commoner origin; introduced characters: Shani
  • Introduction of the Noble origin; introduced characters: Yennefer and Eskel
